title: Links that are supposed to open in new tabs aren't
content:
Since around last week (118.0.2 on Windows 10), links that are supposed to open in new tabs by default, such as the join link for a Blackboard webinar which opens in a new tab, aren't. When clicked, they don't do anything. Manual "open this link in a new window" links work, but windows that are supposed to automatically open in new tabs aren't responding. I have pop-ups turned on for the relevant websites. Here's the list of add-ons I have, but I don't think any of them are likely to interfere with tabs.

AdNauseam Behind The Overlay Block Site Bypass Paywalls Clean Decentraleyes DownThemAll Ecosia Facebook Container FastForward Firefox Multi-Account Containers Firefox Relay FoxReplace Greasemonkey Indie Wiki Buddy KeePass Tusk Privacy Possum uBlacklist User-Agent Switcher WebP / Avif image converter WhatCampaign Youtube to MP3
creator: theenforcer

title: Search engine does not open in new tab?
content:
Hi; Search engine does not open in new tab. This is not how it used to work. Not sure when this started, possibly when windows updated to Win11(2 weeks ago), but not sure. I think there used to be a setting for opening a search in new tab, but I can not find it. I have "Add search bar in toolbar" checked. I use DDG as search engine. I did lookup in FF help but found 10yr old answers. I am sure many things have changed since then.

Also when searching FF help is there a way to sort by newest first?

TIA
creator: newdino

title: no me aparece la opción lista de pocket en el botón de catálogo
content:
Hola,

Acabo de añadir una pagina a una lista que he creado en pocket pero no tengo forma de verla, no sé como acceder a ella, no me aparece la opción de lista de pocket en el botón de catalogo, solo me aparecen Marcadores, Historial y Descargas, nada más! Alguna solución? Donde puedo ver rápidamente las paginas que tengo en pocket?

creator: bastet_82

title: Firefox Sync
content:
The original email address identifier I used to get into Firefox sync was discontinued by my provider and I could no longer get or send email from that account.

The new email account is a modification of the old one and now conforms with my provider’s new identifier.

Of course this change made it impossible to get into my Firefox account and to use Firefox Sync.

My old email address, which is no longer functional, is tied to the account and I can’t get into the account to change the settings and replace the email address. Nor can I delete the account.

I tried to get into the account by switching to my google email address but the same problem arose each time. I am denied entry because the Google Authentication Code which I get on my phone and enter on my browser is always flagged as INVALID. This has happened so often that I am seriously considering changing from Firefox to a different browser.

My old Firefox recovery keys no longer work either. Presumably they are tied to the old email address and password.

I support Mozilla and it’s philosophy of open source, but this is driving me to desperation.

All I want to do is sync my two computer browsers with each other so I can work better. To do that I need to get back into my account.
creator: your_message

title: Secure Connection Failed
content: I can't access my email in fastmail.us and I can not reach their support page either. I am running FF119.0.2 (64bit) on windows10. This problem started with the upgrade to this version. I can reach my email on my iPad and on MSFT Edge which leads to the conclusion that this problem is FF related.

title: Tabs from previous session no longer open on startup.
content: I'm running version 118.02.2 (64-bit) of Firefox on Windows 12. I *always* have the 'Open previous windows and tabs' checked. Starting yesterday, Firefox opens with nothing other than a blank page. Luckily for me, this has happened in the past and I have a Bookmarks Menu folder with my default tabs saved. Even so, it's still frustrating.

content: Formatei minha máquina e antes conferi que minha conta estava logada e sincronizada, porem agora depois de instalar o firefox, os dados sumiram da conta, não sincronizou favoritos nem contas, fiz uma restauração do edge com um pouco dos meus dados, porem o que estava sincronizado recente perdi tudo.

title: blocked email account - I have tried to sync and recover my blocked account - it sends a verification code to that email address, so I can't recieve it.
content: Tell me how to unblock an email account, that has been blocked by Firefox- I have tried to sync and it sends me an email to the blocked account with a verification number. So how can I get my email account unblocked?
creator: jgcaller15

title: Opening New Tabs
content: I'm running Windows 11 and the latest version of Firefox. In settings, we are presented with two options when opening a new tab: customizable Firefox home page (with a Google search field) or blank page. Neither is acceptable. I want my default home page to appear when opening a new tab. How do I achieve that? Why is this simple option apparently not available?
creator: boycelovett

title: Automatic Updates on Multisession Hosts like RDS / Azure Virtual Desktop
content:
Dear Firefox-Community, alot of our customers are using firefox esr on alot of Azure Virtual Desktop or RDS Session Hosts.

Now we have the issue that the auto update background service is not working without the first user which started Firefox.

Example: New Session Host with Firefox -> User X starts Firefox -> Firefox creates scheduled Task in user x context. If User X doesn't log in to the Session host no automatic Updates are installed.

We've activated the maintenance service

Is there any way to allow autoupdate without user x being logged in to the session host?
creator: MrBrightside

title: Unable to search or log on to google " We are unable to find that site"
content: I have cleared my browsing history and cookies with no help. I can't access anything google. The last line of the error message is "Check that Firefox has permission to access the web (you might be connected but behind a firewall)". I haven't changed any settings,that I'm aware of, and I'm running out of ideas.
creator: pmw97ws6

title: On re-starting FF all minimised windows from the previous session are open
content:
I'm running FF 118.0.2 on Ubuntu 22.04. In settings, I have FF set to open previous windows and tabs. When FF does this it leaves all the windows open.

When I close FF only one window is open all the rest are minimised, so at startup I have to minimise most of the windows.

I wonder if there is some way of persuading FF to remember the state of my windows when it re-starts so that those that were minimised remain minimised?

Thanks in advance for any help.
creator: gavrilloprincep

title: A few problems - Firefox slowly loads pages after reboot - Cant click on links - 2nd Icon on Desktop
content:
As stated a few problems with Firefox.

When Firefox is restarted, pages take forever to load. This has been an ongoing problem. Previously once the pages initially loaded, I could go to any site afterwards without issues.

After an update Firefox now quickly has problems after loading. Firefox stalls, or when I click on a link, the link does not work. Task manager will show high usage with just one page opened. I have removed add-ons. That did not fix the issue. I end up closing Firefox and restarting. I can get it to work for a short period of time, but it ends up stalling again and I have to close it again.

If I open in private mode there is not a problem with loading pages.

I just realized there is a 2nd icon on the desktop that shows it was installed on September 28, 2023. If I click on that icon I get a message to make Firefox my primary browser. Firefox is already set as my primary browser. That version of Firefox does not have any of my bookmarks installed. Out of caution, I have not tested it to see if it works beyond opening it.

When I click on the properties for each shortcut, The new Firefox shows to be located in My account > App Data > Local > Mozilla Firefox The account I have been using for a couple of years is located in This PC > Local Disk (C:) > Profile Files > Mozilla Firefox
creator: HiddenAncientRelic

title: Fix the customized colours definition for email writting
content: Hi Thunderbird family, how can I fix the customized colours definition for email writting in order to avoid doing it every time? Is ther a way to fix it for ever?. Thank you for your help. Best regards, BOV

title: HTML backup (bookmarks)
content:
Am I understanding this correctly? 

HTML backup (bookmarks) doesn't support tags and annotations, but JSON backup does, and JSON backup doesn't preserve the website favicons, but HTML backup does?

So, what I can do, is restore my (saved) bookmarks using JSON backup, then restore the HTML backup, this would get my tags and annotations, and the website favicons back? But the downside, I will need to remove duplicates?
